summary: A scientific expedition sets out for Borneo to seek a flower called the Blood Orchid, which could grant longer life. Meanwhile, they run afoul of snakes and each other.
cast: Johnny Messner|KaDee Strickland|Matthew Marsden|Nicholas Gonzalez|Eugene Byrd|Karl Yune|Salli Richardson-Whitfield|Morris Chestnut|Andy Anderson|Nicholas Hope|Peter Curtin|Denis Arndt|Khoa Do|Aireti|Andre Tandjung
director: Director: Dwight H. Little (as Dwight Little)
title: Anacondas: La cacería por la orquídea sangrienta
